price: 66. Et si Nous le voulions, Nous leur ôterions la vue et ils se précipiteraient (pour trouver) la voie. Mais comment donc pourraient-ils la voir ?
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ فَٱسۡتَبَقُواْ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu laṭamasnā ʿalā aʿyunihim fa-is'tabaqū al-ṣirāṭa fa-annā yub'ṣirūna
